author: jonl
msg: Added FAQ entry for setting session properties

author: jonl
msg: Added ISessionFactory interface for creating sessions and added an abstract method getSessionFactory() to Application so applications can implement their own session factories.  Since the downcasting of getProperty() is obviated by this, removed session properties.  Will add a FAQ entry on how to set values on a session using the session factory approach since this will come up /a lot/.
